name: Soulmates (meowmee)
description:
Welcome to Soulmates: Matchmaking Services where our slogan is "You're not alone, everyone has a soulmatch!". :D 

We couldn't be more excited for you to join the Soulmates team and start bringing beautiful souls together. <3 :) 

As a Soulmates matchmaker extraordinaire, you will be sifting through our online employee portal to find our clients' their most perfect soulmatches! Time to jump in and make some soulmatches - and who knows, if you match enough souls you may just steal my title of employee of the year (but I doubt it hee-hee :P)!

__________________________________________________________________________

This game was developed in seven days for the 2022 Brackey's Game Jam - Theme: You're Not Alone. 

Thank you so much for playing our game and for your support! <3 :)

.:~*Game Dev Team*~:.

Game Programmer: Chelsea Soares

Artist: Natalie Cruz

Audio / Game Design: Courtney Soares

Game Tester: Nicholas Jaffari

.:~*Special Thanks To*~:. 

Amelia & Hamp <3

Bringles

Elser - Let 'er go! 

Moonpie

...Or maybe sheet ghosts 

It is good. It is can.

The left sock that never was (...but could've been Chelsea ^-^)

And YOU! For playing our game!:D Thank you so much you beautiful soul! <3
